title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid data and receives an email verification prompt.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user information including role (carrier, broker, shipper, admin).
Submit the registration form.
Verify the registration completes without error.
Verify an email verification link is sent to the provided email.

title: User Registration Validation Failures
description: Validate registration form input checks and error messages for invalid or missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Submit registration with missing required fields.
Verify appropriate error messages are displayed for missing fields.
Submit registration with invalid email format.
Verify validation error for invalid email is shown.
Submit registration with weak password.
Verify password strength validation error is displayed.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered and verified user can log in with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to role-specific dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error messages display.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter incorrect email or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is rejected with a clear error message.

title: Email Verification Workflow
description: Verify that user cannot access main features until email is verified and email verification link works.

steps.description: Register a new user.
Verify user is marked as unverified in the system.
Attempt to login and access restricted features.
Verify access is denied with messaging prompting email verification.
Click the email verification link received in email.
Verify user status updates to verified.
Login and confirm access to all authorized features.

title: Admin Dashboard Access Control
description: Verify that only admin users can access the admin command center and features are role-restricted.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Verify admin dashboard loads with correct data and functional links.
Attempt to access admin dashboard when logged in as carrier or broker or shipper.
Verify access is denied with appropriate error or redirect.

title: Load CRUD Operations
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations for freight loads with proper validation.

steps.description: Login as authorized user.
Create a new load with valid data.
Verify load is created and appears in load list.
Update load details with valid changes.
Verify load details are updated in UI and backend.
Delete the load.
Verify load is removed from list and backend.
Attempt to create update with invalid data (e.g. invalid dates, missing fields).
Verify validation errors are shown and operation is blocked.

title: Real-time Messaging Functionality
description: Verify real-time messaging works between two users with correct friend connection setup.

steps.description: Login as user A and send a friend request to user B using their unique identifier.
Verify user B receives the friend request and can accept it.
User A sends a real-time message to user B after friend acceptance.
Verify user B receives the message instantly.
User B replies in real-time.
Verify user A receives the reply message instantly.

title: Dashboard Analytics Data Accuracy
description: Verify that role-based dashboards display correct real-time analytics, charts, and statistics matching backend data.

steps.description: Login as carrier, broker, and shipper respectively.
Verify each dashboard shows accurate charts and statistics relevant to the role.
Trigger backend updates that affect analytics data.
Verify dashboard analytics update in real-time or on refresh.
Validate data correctness with database query results.

title: Document Upload and Download
description: Verify document upload enforces file type and size constraints, stores securely, and download functions properly.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to document upload page.
Upload a document of allowed file type and within size limits.
Verify upload is accepted and file is stored securely.
Attempt to upload a document exceeding size limits or invalid file type.
Verify upload is rejected with clear error messages.
Download an uploaded document.
Verify document downloads successfully and file integrity is maintained.

title: Search and Saved Queries Functionality
description: Verify advanced search returns accurate results and saved queries can be created, executed, edited, and deleted.

steps.description: Perform a load search with specific filter criteria.
Verify search results only include loads matching criteria.
Save the search query with a custom name.
Verify saved query appears in saved queries list.
Execute the saved query.
Verify the executed query returns correct results.
Edit the saved query and save changes.
Verify changes are saved and executed correctly.
Delete the saved query.
Verify it is removed from saved queries list.

title: Push Notifications and Rate Limiting
description: Verify push notifications are delivered for alerts and rate limiting triggers properly under abuse scenarios.

steps.description: Trigger an event that should generate a push notification (e.g. new load, message).
Verify user receives push notification on UI and/or device.
Send excessive requests to API endpoints to simulate abuse.
Verify rate limiting blocks requests and appropriate error is returned.
Verify normal requests after rate limiting cooldown succeed.

title: Security Mechanisms Validation
description: Ensure JWT authentication, password hashing, CORS policies, Helmet headers, and input validation function correctly and resist attacks.

steps.description: Attempt unauthorized access to protected API endpoints without JWT token.
Verify access is denied.
Login and capture JWT token, then use token for API requests.
Verify token grants access to authorized resources.
Inspect password storage to confirm use of bcrypt hashing.
Verify stored passwords are hashed and salted.
Test input fields with injection strings.
Verify input validation prevents injection attacks.
Verify HTTP responses include CORS, Helmet security headers, and gzip compression.

title: Frontend Performance and Responsiveness
description: Verify frontend loads within 3 seconds, API responses occur in under 500ms, and UI adapts responsively across devices.

steps.description: Load main web pages on broadband network.
Verify page load time is under 3 seconds.
Measure API response times for critical endpoints.
Verify response times are below 500ms.
Resize browser window or test on various devices.
Verify UI elements adjust properly and remain usable.
Test app offline capabilities.
Verify UI shows appropriate offline indicators and limited functionality.

title: User Profile Management
description: Verify users can view and edit their profile details securely, and changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to profile page.
Edit profile information fields and submit changes.
Verify updated information is saved and displayed correctly.
Attempt invalid profile updates (e.g. invalid email format).
Verify validation errors are shown and updates rejected.

title: Session Security and Monitoring
description: Verify user security sessions display current active sessions and allow secure logout from other sessions.

steps.description: Login from multiple browsers/devices.
Navigate to session monitoring page.
Verify all active sessions are listed with accurate details.
Trigger logout from a selected session.
Verify the session is terminated securely.
